class_description:
The Manifest class is used to maintain Manifest entry names and their
 associated Attributes. There are main Manifest Attributes as well as
 per-entry Attributes. For information on the Manifest format, please
 see the
 
 Manifest format specification.

params.param_description: the input stream containing manifest data

Methods.method_description: Constructs a new Manifest from the specified input stream.
Constructs a new Manifest that is a copy of the specified Manifest.
Clears the main Attributes as well as the entries in this Manifest.

return_description: a shallow copy of this Manifest

Methods.method_description:
Returns a shallow copy of this Manifest.  The shallow copy is
 implemented as follows:

return_description:
true if the specified Object is also a Manifest and has
 the same main Attributes and entries

Methods.method_description:
Returns true if the specified Object is also a Manifest and has
 the same main Attributes and entries.

return_description: the Attributes for the specified entry name

Methods.method_description:
Returns the Attributes for the specified entry name.
 This method is defined as:
 

 Note that this method does not return the manifest's main attributes;
 see getMainAttributes().

return_description: a Map of the entries contained in this Manifest

Methods.method_description:
Returns a Map of the entries contained in this Manifest. Each entry
 is represented by a String name (key) and associated Attributes (value).
 The Map permits the null key, but no entry with a null key is
 created by read(InputStream), nor is such an entry written by using write(OutputStream).

return_description: the main Attributes for the Manifest

Methods.method_description: Returns the main Attributes for the Manifest.

return_description: a hash code value for this object.

Methods.method_description: Returns the hash code for this Manifest.

Reads the Manifest from the specified InputStream. The entry
 names and attributes read will be merged in with the current
 manifest entries.

Writes the Manifest to the specified OutputStream.
 Attributes.Name.MANIFEST_VERSION must be set in
 MainAttributes prior to invoking this method.
